data.lyric:
[ti:Bam Bam]
[ar:Camila Cabello,Ed Sheeran]
[al:Familia (Explicit)]
[by:p_pttzhang]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bam Bam - Camila Cabello (卡蜜拉·卡贝罗)/Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Camila Cabello/Ed Sheeran/Eric Frederic/Édgar Barrera/Cheche Alara/Scott Harris
[00:00.18]Composed by：Camila Cabello/Ed Sheeran/Eric Frederic/Édgar Barrera/Cheche Alara/Scott Harris
[00:00.25]You said you hated the ocean but you're surfing now
[00:02.90]
[00:04.90]I said I'd love you for life but I just sold our house
[00:08.04]
[00:10.01]We were kids at the start I guess we're grown ups now
[00:13.12]
[00:15.36]Couldn't ever imagine even having doubts
[00:18.46]But not everything works out
[00:21.57]No
[00:22.34]Now I'm out dancing with strangers
[00:25.02]You could be casually dating
[00:27.51]Damn it's all changing so fast
[00:30.45]Así es la vida si
[00:33.10]Yeah that's just life baby
[00:35.18]
[00:36.02]Yeah love came around
[00:37.25]And it knocked me down
[00:38.64]But I'm back on my feet
[00:40.55]Así es la vida si
[00:43.19]Yeah that's just life baby
[00:45.36]
[00:45.98]I was barely standin'
[00:47.61]But now I'm dancing
[00:48.88]He's all over me
[00:50.35]
[00:51.22]Bam bam bam bam
[00:55.85]Bam bam bam bam
[01:00.13]
[01:00.91]Bam bam bam bam
[01:05.89]Bam bam bam bam bam
[01:10.05]
[01:10.68]It's been a hell of a year thank God we made it out
[01:13.46]
[01:15.62]Yeah we were riding a wave and trying not to drown
[01:18.61]
[01:19.48]And on the surface I held it together but underneath I sorta came unwound
[01:23.47]
[01:24.46]Where would I be
[01:25.36]You're all that I need my world
[01:27.15]Baby you hold me down
[01:28.57]
[01:29.63]You always hold me down now
[01:33.09]I've been the breaker and broken
[01:35.74]Every mistake turned to moments
[01:38.16]Wouldn't take anything back
[01:40.67]
[01:41.22]Así es la vida si
[01:43.74]Yeah that's just life baby
[01:45.92]
[01:46.78]Yeah love came around
[01:47.93]And it knocked me down
[01:49.14]But I'm back on my feet
[01:51.31]Así es la vida si
[01:53.84]Yeah that's just life baby
[01:56.48]I was barely standin'
[01:58.23]But now I'm dancing
[01:59.55]He's all over me
[02:01.48]Bam bam bam bam
[02:04.34]Bam bam bam bam

[02:11.60]Bam bam bam bam bam
[02:21.35]Ponganle azúcar mi gente
[02:23.74]

[02:25.79]

[02:46.54]

[03:00.15]He's all over me
